item.title: php - Ubuntu 14 PHP 5.6 or to upgrade from PHP 5.5
item.description: php - Ubuntu 14 PHP 5.6 or to upgrade from PHP 5.5 sudo apt-get -y update sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ondrej/php5-5.6 sudo apt-get -y update sudo apt-get -y install php5 php5-mhash php5-mcrypt php5-curl php5-cli php5-mysql php5-gd php5-intl php5-xsl php5-bcmath if use php -v check version is 5.5.x I use sudo apt-get -u install php5-cli Refer - PHP 5.5 or 5.6—Ubuntu
